definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[שׁער]] (√of foll.; Ar. 3agara break, break off, through, 3a9run gap, opening; Eth. sa9ara: tear in two, dissolve; Aram. tra9 (transp.) split, divide, [[תְּרַע]] tear down; NH [[שַׁעַר]] gate, so MI:22 [[שעריה]] (pl. sf.), Ph. [[שער]] Lzb:381; Tel Am. šaḫri, as Canaanism, Wkl:195, 1. 16; Aram. [[תַּרְעָא]], tar9o0; Nab. [[תרעא]] Lzb:388;—Egypt. šạār is loan-word Bondi:70).
